item.title: #TIL : Using web proxy to bypass firewalls
item.description: Using web proxy to bypass firewalls Someday, you will be blocked by a firewall while trying crawling or accessing some website.

item.title: #TIL : Enable reverse proxy in CentOS
item.description: Enable reverse proxy in CentOS CentOS with SELinux enabled by default will block any http proxy connection.

item.title: Webfonts Optimization Using Nginx
item.description: Context Everytime you decided to use a webfont on your web, you think about Google Web Fonts, which is the best CDN for webfonts at this moment.
